REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2357 reute r f BC-STANADYNE-<STNA>,-UNI 03-24 0040

TEXT.TITLE: STANADYNE <STNA>, UNITED TECHNOLOGIES END TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Stanadyne Inc said it terminated discussions about its proposed purchase of United Technologies Corp's Diesel Systems <UTX> unit. The reason was not disclosed. Reuter
